Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp22.renderer

Class Camera

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp22.renderer.Camera
public class Camera extends Object
Class to represent the camera. Has support for animation.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
    protected
    Camera(Point position)
    Creates a Camera at the location provided.

  • Constructor Details

    • Camera

      protected Camera(Point position)
      Creates a Camera at the location provided.
      Parameters:
      position - the position of the Camera

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(Point position)
      Updates the camera to the position provided.
      Parameters:
      position - the new location of the Camera

    • getX

      public int getX()
      Gets the x coordinate of the Camera in screen space. If the Camera has a valid animation it returns the x coordinate from the Animation.
      Returns:
      integer x coordinate of the Camera

    • getY

      public int getY()
      Gets the y coordinate of the Camera in screen space. If the Camera has a valid animation it returns the y coordinate from the Animation.
      Returns:
      integer y coordinate of the Camera

    • getTileX

      public int getTileX()
      Gets the x coordinate of the Tile the camera is on (in world space).
      Returns:
      integer of the x coordinate of the camera's tile

    • getTileY

      public int getTileY()
      Gets the y coordinate of the Tile the camera is on (in world space).
      Returns:
      integer of the y coordinate of the camera's tile

    • getTilePoint

      public Point getTilePoint()
      Gets the camera's position in tile coordinates (in world space).
      Returns:
      tile coordinates as point

    • addAnimation

      public void addAnimation(Animation newAnimation)
      Adds an animation to the Camera. Replaces the existing animation if there is one present. Used to smoothly animate the camera's position between tiles.
      Parameters:
      newAnimation - the new animation to add to the camera

    • removeAnimation

      public void removeAnimation()
      Removes the camera's animation if one is present.

    • getVisionDistance

      public int getVisionDistance()
      Gets the vision distance.
      Returns:
      the distance in tiles the camera can see (from camera location).

    • getVisionSize

      public int getVisionSize()
      Gets the vision distance.
      Returns:
      the dimensions of the total size of the square vision area (width and height).
